description: Run tests to validate the implemented AI Service Interaction Module.

instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the AIWhisperer project.
Ensure the Python environment is activated and dependencies are installed (e.g., `pip install -r requirements.txt`).
Execute the unit tests for the AI Service Interaction Module using pytest: `pytest tests/unit/test_ai_service_interaction.py`.
Execute the integration tests for the AI Service Interaction Module using pytest: `pytest tests/integration/test_ai_service_interaction_integration.py`.
Review the output of both pytest commands to confirm all tests passed.
constraints: Must be run in an environment where Python and pytest are installed and the project dependencies are met.
Requires access to the test files specified in `input_artifacts`.
validation_criteria: The command `pytest tests/unit/test_ai_service_interaction.py` completes successfully with no failed tests.
The command `pytest tests/integration/test_ai_service_interaction_integration.py` completes successfully with no failed tests.
The output of pytest clearly indicates that all collected tests passed for both unit and integration test suites.
